bibl.title: Looking at the Egyptian Elite: Sculptural Production of the Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: Focuses particularly on the introduction of individual elements in the rendering of the face and the use of prearranging models for the creation of realistic heads. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Giorgia Cafici, Looking at the Egyptian Elite: Sculptural Production of the Ptolemaic Period.
Focuses particularly on the introduction of individual elements in the rendering of the face and the use of prearranging models for the creation of realistic heads. - Avec résumé en anglais.
